title: The Pool and the Pedestal
description: SPOILER BOOK I OF THE THE MERCHANT AND THE MENACE is available on Amazon. This description contains elements of BOOK I. Kael Brelgson stands in the capital of the Nearing World confused and disturbed by the events of the past few weeks. His brother Aemmon is dead and Kael has been ripped from his comfortable, anonymous life. In an attempt to reunite with his father, he rushes into the heart of strife. Zodra, the last citadel standing against the servants of Amird the Fallen Seraph, prepares for war. Those within her walls must decide where and when they will fight. Kael must choose as well. He senses the calling within. Should he run from it, or embrace the Creatorâ€™s design and face life as a New Seraph and all of the dangers that life entails? In Book II of The Seraphinium new threats arise, old friendships are renewed, powerful allies are unveiled and ancient evils arise in the frozen North. The North that beckons Kael with the answers to his questions.
author: Daniel McHugh
